q: At Facebook, 26-year-old founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg calls the shots in an entrepreneurial culture that has enticed dozens of engineers to leave Google Inc. to work for the social networking company. My goal is to run Google Inc. at the pace and with the soul and passion of a startup, Page said in a Thursday interview. Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future, said Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer , in a statement. Satya Nadella replaces Microsoft veteran Bob Muglia as head of the highly profitable server business. Steve Ballmer took the unusual step in January of publicly announcing that he thought Muglia

STB) is on his way out. In a memo to Microsoft employees, CEO Steve Ballmer made it clear that Muglia's departure signals a shift in the direction the company intends to pursue. I have decided that now is the time to put new leadership in place for STB. This is simply recognition that all businesses go through cycles and need new and different talent to manage through those cycles, Steve Ballmer wrote in his email to the troops.
